name: NSStackView.Gravity
desc: The gravity areas available in a stack view.

items.name: case top
items.desc: The topmost gravity area in a vertically oriented stack view.

items.name: static var leading: NSStackView.Gravity
items.desc: The leftmost or rightmost gravity area in a horizontally oriented stack view, based on the user interface language or the explicitly set user interface layout direction.

items.name: case center
items.desc: The center gravity area, regardless of stack view layout direction or user interface language.

items.name: case bottom
items.desc: The bottommost gravity area in a vertically oriented stack view.

items.name: static var trailing: NSStackView.Gravity
items.desc: The leftmost or rightmost gravity area in a horizontally oriented stack view, based on the user interface language or the explicitly set user interface layout direction.
